Description:
Land in Quiet Established Street
Substantial blocks of land in an established neighbourhood are often hard to find these days. Look no further this may be just the block you are seeking. Sloping from north to south the block has the possibility of views from the rear with a spacious North facing back yard. The substantial size gives plenty of options for the placement of your new home.
Located close to public transport and just down the road from the Clifton Springs boat ramp. There are a variety of schools locally, all necessary amenities and a large array of cafes and restaurants. Fifteen minutes from the surf or ten minutes from the Bay for a spot of fishing.
730m2
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 23 Bullimah Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Beautiful lifestyle family home
Positioned on the high side of Takanna Avenue, this property has plenty to offer the astute buyer who is looking for the absolute high end quality home. Upon entry, you are greeted with beautiful solid hardwood polished flooring that runs throughout the entire home.The master bedroom has a beautiful outlook courtesy of the large feature window. It also boasts an oversized walk-in robe with reclaimed oregon shelving, spacious ensuite featuring double vanity, granite benchtop, high quality fittings and a large walk-in double shower with rainfall shower heads. As you proceed up the main hallway past a second living room with elevated ceilings, a curved wall gives way to a stylish kitchen with glass splash back, granite island bench with waterfall sides, walk-in pantry, stainless steel appliances and an abundance of storage. This stunning kitchen overlooks a large open plan dining/living area through to a beautiful entertaining area through a set of double glazed sliding doors.The home has three other spacious bedrooms all with built in robes and a generous study that overlooks the outside garden area. The bathroom also consists of granite benchtops, double vanities and is luxurious. With well-maintained low maintenance gardens and a large outdoor undercover entertainment area. 17 Takanna Avenue is loaded with all the mod cons and creature comforts any family could want or need especially those wanting to make the sea change to enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer. An inspection is a must for you to fully appreciate what this home really has on offer.
Insights: 17 Takanna Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

A Great Chance to Buy

Description:
Solid Home, Great Investment
Have you been looking for a neat & tidy investment property but do not want to go through the fuss of finding a good tenant, then you must take a minute to see this rare opportunity to not only purchase a great investment, but to invest into a fantastic pocket of Clifton Springs where local shops, public transport and local school are just minutes' walk away. This spacious unit is on its own title and offers two generous bedrooms with BIR's, open plan kitchen/meals area and bathroom with separate toilet. Complete with your own private yard and single garage. Currently leased out for $240 per week and in a long term agreement until May 2018.
With so much to offer at such a great price, it's sure to go fast. Call for your inspection today!
Leighton Kidman

Description:
Where the country meets the coast
First home buyers and investors you simply must see this property!
This two-bedroom weatherboard home just oozes charm and character. Situated in a quiet Cu-de-sac in a well established area of Clifton Springs and only minutes walk to the local connivance store. A new Blackwood kitchen with updated appliances, adjoins spacious lounge/dining room with ceiling fan, gas heater and air conditioner. Massive garaging and workshop compliment this property located on a block size of approximately 592m2. With easy access to the backyard featuring a large undercover area and your very own functional wood fire pizza oven.
This is an absolute bargain - first to see will buy at this amazing price. Be quick!

Description:
Come Inside You Won't Be Disappointed!
This immaculate and tastefully decorated 3 bedroom home is going to impress all who enter! It offers the new owners a formal lounge room with bay window plus a spacious family room with sliding door leading out to the undercover outdoor living. The kitchen with adjoining meals area is only a couple of years old- has top of the range appliances and ample storage for the family chef. All 3 bedrooms are well proportioned- the master is very generously sized indeed and has a full ensuite and bay window and faces north to capture the winter sunshine. The double garage has internal access. Central heating and reverse cycle split system keep the home comfortable all year round. Lovely gardens surround the property. A delightful inspection.

Description:
Calling All Renovators And First Home Buyers!
Being presented to the market for the first time, this brick-veneer home on 597sqm has been well-loved by the one family but is now ready for reinvention.
The home is well-maintained and comprises two inviting living areas, potential for a great outdoor living space with a sunny northerly aspect, generous kitchen with plenty of storage, 3 bedrooms including the spacious Master with built-in-robe and a family bathroom with separate toilet.
Additional highlights include air-conditioning, Solar electricity, gas heating, well-maintained garden with multiple sheds, undercover carport and lock-up garage.
This perfectly positioned home is ripe for those who know opportunity when it knocks. Don't delay, enquire today!

Description:
4 Bedrooms plus Home Office!
Opportunity knocks. Dont be slow to respond! This spacious 4 bedroom home is a real find. Private, modern and set in a quiet court location it offers the new owner the opportunity to work from home in the separate home office if desired. The open plan kitchen (quality appliances), meals and family room is light and welcoming. A formal lounge-room is at the front of the home and adjoins the master bedroom offering parents a quiet retreat. Both living zones are north facing and take advantage of the warming winter sunshine. Built in robes to 3 bedrooms plus WIR and ensuite to the master bedroom. Undercover living perfect for outdoor entertainment year round. Central heating and reverse cycle air conditioning keeps the home comfortable in any weather. LED lighting throughout, solar panels, instant gas HWS are just a few of this lovely homes many appealing features. Book your inspection today.

AFFORDABLE FIRST TIME BUY OR GREAT INVESTMENT
No. 19 is set in a leafy aspect and a short distance to all amenities. The open plan area combines dining, living and kitchen, doors open to outdoor alfresco space, so easy to entertain and enjoy in and out with ease. Three bedrooms with BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the plan. Features include gas fire, s/s upright stove, pantry, water tank and timber kitchen benches. Matured garden and fernery allows for privacy, whilst providing the scope to really make this a real haven. Single garage with internal access, carport and paved front veranda. Currently let at $275 per week. Ring me to inspect.

Description:
Views & Quiet Location!
Exceptionally maintained and presented is this home in a quiet street of Clifton Springs. Views from the living room and large deck. Imagine your life relaxing here, coffee, tea or wine whatever is your pleasure. The kitchen also allows you to enjoy the view, so the meal preparations will not be so mundane. They say the woman picks the home by the kitchen and the man picks the home by the man pad well here you will find two ticks. Upstairs for her, downstairs for him, your only decision is if you require an intercom? Timber flooring and 9' ceilings are features of this home that allow a very open light feeling. What more can I say than book a time to view this beautiful property. Clifton Springs is a hidden secret finally being discovered. Are you looking for a relaxed lifestyle and a change of your current scene? Can I encourage you to come for a drive and see what we have to offer? Restaurants, wineries and cafes for those relaxing paper reading days.
Insights: 10 Carawatha Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Easy Bayside Living
Set in a quiet street only a short drive from both Drysdale Village and the bay, this updated and well presented 3 bedroom home simply oozes with family appeal! Informal, yet modern living sets the theme throughout with sleek floating timber flooring and cleverly zoned yet open plan living providing plenty of space for everyone to enjoy! The large living room and wrap around dining are complimented by the large windows which allow an abundance of light to flow all year round. The second living/family area and modern kitchen offers an abundance of storage, gas cooking and ample bench space which will appease even the fussiest of family chefs. All three bedrooms are spacious, have BIR's (master with WIR) and serviced by a modern family bathroom while comfort is assured with zoned ducted heating and cooling throughout. Outside, the property sits on an ample block of 585m2 (approx.) with generous outdoor entertaining, private gardens, carport and lock up garage/workshop.
Insights: 7 Tarkarri Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Bigger Than It Looks From The Front!
Don't let the front of this home fool you, it is much bigger than it looks. This home has a welcoming feel. A come in and have a coffee type of feel. A home designed for a crowd to be entertained and plenty of rooms for the guests to stay. Enough space to have groups in zones Lounge, Living & Rumpus. Main bedroom away from the others with ensuite and WIR. In a local traffic only street this quiet location is perfect for unwinding and enjoying friends and family.
Our neighbourhood offers all you need to live work and play. A place to enjoy eating at cafes and restaurants, enjoy outdoor activities such as bike riding, walking or horse riding. Get involved with the local sporting or service groups. The Bellarine Peninsula has been a hidden gem up til now because people are wanting to experience what we have to offer.

Description:
Exceptional!!
NEW PRICE POSITION - PRICED TO SELL! The word exceptional simply does not do this property justice!!! Built to impress this contemporary townhouse will definitely appeal to a buyer who demands style, generous light filled living zones, a practical floor plan and quality fixtures and fittings. Boasting 3 generous bedrooms (master with full ensuite and walk in robe) and an additional study. A light and bright kitchen/family/meals complete with stone bench top and ample storage solutions. A separate lounge is bathed in natural light from its floor to ceiling features windows. Landscaped low maintenance gardens and positioned within an elevated boutique pocket of Clifton Springs. With all the modern comforts including ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a remote controlled double garage (internal access) makes this property an absolute standout on the market.

Description:
Lifestyle Choice with Views
Perfectly situated on the high side of the street offering lovely panoramic views over the bay; just wait to see them as the photos simply donâ??t do them justice! This charming 3 bedroom property is bathed into natural light with its northerly aspect and has a genuine homely appeal. An expansive wrap around veranda provides shelter from the elements as you take in various view aspects from your favourite vantage spots. A double carport and a double garage offers ample car accommodation and shedding. Set within a lovely quiet pocket of Clifton Springs; the boat ramp only a short stroll away, the Clifton Springs Golf Club & Bowls Club literally up the road and close to all that is great about the Bellarine and the lifestyle if offers! A lovely home for today and an excellent investment for the future; scope to build on a second story and significantly value add.

Description:
Fantastic Value, First Class Living!
Take away the headaches of building with this classy near new home. Fully landscaped and ready to go, offering quality accommodation to suit the most particular home buyer or investor.
A neutral and modern colour palette throughout add to the sense of space while the quality fixtures and fittings and a family friendly floor plan make this a truly functional and comfortable home. Four generous sized bedrooms with built-in robes are serviced by a full and spacious family bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet while the light filled master bedroom offers large en-suite and oversized walk-in robe.
The bright and airy, open plan living and meals area features stylish gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and huge walk in pantry. And you won't be short of space with the home also offering a dedicated 2nd living room.
Outside, a paved alfresco area towards the back of the property and securely fenced back yard makes for an ideal entertaining space for summer BBQ's and indoor/outdoor living.
Year round comfort is maintained with central heating and split system A/C. Extras including solar/gas hot water and double remote garage means that this home ticks all of the boxes.
Tucked quietly away in and highly desirable region of Clifton Springs with easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula. This is fantastic lifestyle opportunity or great ready made investment!
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 31 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Centrally Located, Modern Home
This is truly an opportunity not to be missed!
Upon entering this immaculate family home, you will be greeted with space, style and ample natural light.
Multiple open plan living zones and quality fittings are true features and the three bedrooms are generous in size (the master retreat incorporates a reading space, impressive en-suite and walk in robe).
The open plan kitchen, family and dining areas are ideal spaces to relax entertain or mingle.
The gourmet kitchen features adequate cupboard space, bench space and modern appliances. The theatre room or pool room offers versatility and is the ideal informal entertaining space. The living area opens seamlessly to a paved outdoor entertaining area with a beautiful treed outlook.
Central gas heating throughout with the added feature of a glowing gas log fire in the lounge/sitting room provides comfort all year round.
The garden is easily maintained and neatly presented, with garden shed and rear entry from the DLUG, featuring remote panel door. Side access on the northern boundary to the back yard is an added bonus for those with boats, vans etc.
Located close to schools, the main Drysdale shopping centre and in easy reach of the all the Bellarine has to offer, this is truly a wonderful place to call home.
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 31 Sea Haven Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
ROLL YOUR SLEEVES UP AND GET DIRTY
One of the original homes in Clifton Springs that was designed to enjoy the views from the front porch. The warmth of timber floors and large windows letting the light in are lovely features which make you feel right at home as soon as you walk in. Be warned this is a "big project" home.
In a suburb that is yet to reach its peak, where you can achieve a lot of house for your money. It's a great time to buy before the prices increase as these homes will be harder to come by. With a bit of time and money this home could be restored to its former glory. Are you up to the challenge?
